itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping Maple Timber. It requires the knowledge of Chopping: Beginner.

※ Find Lebyos in Heidel and complete the Working the Ash Tree Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Maple Timber
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Forest of Seclusion, Castle Ruins, Bloody Monastery, Northern Plain of Serendia, and Mediah Northern Highlands. It can be also be obtained by Lumbering Maple Trees.

item.name: Maple Plank
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping Maple Timber.

item.name: Maple Plank
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping Maple Timber.

item.name: Wagon Registration: Farm Wagon
item.desc:
Proof of ownership of a <Farm Wagon>, allowing you to access it at a Stable.
- Inventory Slot(s): 14, Acceleration: 100%, Speed: 100%, Turn: 100%, Braking: 100%
It can be used after reaching Lv.8.

※ Using a Wagon License
 1. Right-click the Wagon License and move to the designated Stable.
 2. Talk to the Stable Keeper and select the Stable menu.
 3. Click on the Register Emblem menu and right-click on the Wagon License.
 4. Enter the Wagon’s name and select Confirm to register the Wagon.
 5. Select the registered Wagon and click on the Find menu.

item.name: Wagon Registration: Strong Wagon
item.desc:
Proof of ownership of a <Strong Wagon>, allowing you to access it at a Stable.
- Inventory Slot(s): 10, Acceleration: 110%, Speed: 110%, Turn: 120%, Braking: 120%
It can be used after reaching Lv.8.

※ Using a Wagon License
 1. Right-click the Wagon License and move to the designated Stable.
 2. Talk to the Stable Keeper and select the Stable menu.
 3. Click on the Register Emblem menu and right-click on the Wagon License.
 4. Enter the Wagon’s name and select Confirm to register the Wagon.
 5. Select the registered Wagon and click on the Find menu.

item.name: Serendia Timber Crate
item.desc: A Trade Item containing 5 Maple Plywood and 5 Pine Plywood.

item.name: Balenos Timber Crate
item.desc: A Trade Item containing 5 Ash Plywood and 5 Maple Plywood.

item.name: Strong Wagon Cover
item.desc:
A cover for a wagon.

- Can be Installed on: Wagon

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Farm Wagon Cover
item.desc:
A cover for a four-wheeled wagon.

- Can be Installed on: Four-Wheeled Wagon

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Sturdy Maple Plywood
item.desc:
A processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Plywood Hardener and Maple Plywood. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Skilled.
※ Find Vatudun in Keplan and complete the Materials for Skills Quest to obtain related knowledge.
※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Professional Level 10 and Processing Professional Level 5. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Maple Decorated Beeswax Chandelier (Fluorescent)
item.desc: A fluorescent wax chandelier decorated with maple.

item.name: Heidel Handcrafted High-Quality Bedside Table
item.desc: A high-quality, handcrafted bedside table from Heidel.\n- 4 Set Effect: Interior Points +200

item.desc: A high-quality, handcrafted drawer from Heidel.\n- 4 Set Effect: Interior Points +200
